verses.roman:
śuni' sabe jānilā ei mahāprabhura kārya
hena-kāle āilā tāhāṅ gopīnāthācārya

synonyms: śuni'-hearing this; sabe—all the devotees; jānilā—could understand; ei—this; mahāprabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kārya—the activities; hena-kāle—at that time; āilā—came; tāhāṅ—there; gopīnātha-ācārya—of the name Gopīnātha Ācārya.
translation: Hearing this, the devotees could understand that they were speaking of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Just then, Śrī Gopīnātha Ācārya arrived.
